TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the town of ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG ( “ the ORG ” , Таганрогский городской суд ) granted the applicant 's claim for recovery of MONEY ( “ RUR ” ) which he had lent to a private company and awarded him the interest of RUR CARDINAL,CARDINAL . The applicant 's action in respect of the second defendant , a private person , was rejected .
CARDINAL . The judgment , in its part relating to the award of interests , was quashed by ORG ( “ The Regional Court ” , ORG областной суд ) on appeal on DATE and remitted at first instance .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG rendered a new judgment in the applicant 's favour . The court decided that the private company was to pay the applicant RUR FAC in respect of the accrued interest . In addition the court ruled that the co - defendant , a private person , was to be held vicariously liable for the debts of the private company to the applicant in the total amount of RUR CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . The judgment was not appealed against and on DATE it came into force .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of ORG , acting upon the protest lodged by its President , quashed the judgments of DATE and DATE as well as the decision of DATE and remitted the case at first instance . In particular , the court noted that the factual findings of the first - instance court had been erroneous and in breach of the relevant procedural rules .

CARDINAL . By judgment of DATE ORG freshly examined the case and granted the applicant 's claims in full . The court ruled that the private company was to pay the applicant FAC in respect of the principal debt and FAC in respect of the accrued interest . The court also decided that the co - defendant , the private person , was to be held vicariously liable for the entirety of the debts of the private company to the applicant in the total amount of FAC .
CARDINAL . The judgment of DATE was upheld by ORG on appeal on DATE .

CARDINAL . It appears that the applicant was unsuccessful in a few sets of civil litigation against various third persons who had allegedly failed to re - pay their debts . He also tried unsuccessfully to prosecute these persons .
